name: Puzzle Legends: Game of Monsters - by Fun Games For Free
name_original: Puzzle Legends: Game of Monsters - by Fun Games For Free
description:
Addictive match-3 PUZZLE meets monster-collecting RPG.

Build your team, explore dungeons, and battle powerful monsters. Beat them all to become the ultimate monster master!

• MATCH the orbs to unlock the power of fire, water, and earth
• tons of AWESOME MONSTERS to capture
• several DUNGEONS to explore
• POWER UP your monsters stats to win battles
• EVOLVE your monsters into legendary creatures
• easy to pick up, hard to master

The most anticipated iPhone and iPad game is now available. Get it while it's FREE!
